column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " That was a two - thousand - year - old historical treasure !
#Text=It has n't clicked like you said it would !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Korra , this is n't something you can force .
#Text=If you would only listen to me ... " Korra says : " I have been !
#Text=Maybe the reason I have n't learned airbending yet is because you 're a terrible teacher !
